citation: Open-Source Psychometrics Project. (2019). OSPP Four Temperaments Test. Retrieved from https://openpsychometrics.org/tests/O4TS/

items.text: I am optimistic and enthusiastic about life
I make friends easily and enjoy being around people
I am the life of the party and enjoy entertaining others
I tend to be talkative and expressive
I am ambitious and like to take charge of situations
I am decisive and confident in my opinions
I am goal-oriented and driven to achieve results
I am not afraid of confrontation when necessary
I am thoughtful and analytical in my approach to problems
I pay close attention to details and like things to be done correctly
I tend to be sensitive and easily moved by art or music
I spend a lot of time thinking about the meaning of things
I am easy-going and relaxed most of the time
I am patient and tolerant of others
I prefer a calm and predictable routine
I tend to be a peacemaker and avoid conflict
